text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for competitive gaming. The NVIDIA RTX 2070 in the HIDevolution MSI GT76 Titan DT 9SF 17.3” FHD 240Hz | 3.6 GHz i7-9700K, RTX 2070, 16GB 2666MHz RAM, 512GB PCIe SSD + 1TB HDD | Authorized Performance Upgrades & Warranty is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Elden Ring and Cyberpunk 2077. The build quality of the HIDevolution MSI GT76 Titan DT 9SF 17.3” FHD 240Hz | 3.6 GHz i7-9700K, RTX 2070, 16GB 2666MHz RAM, 512GB PCIe SSD + 1TB HDD | Authorized Performance Upgrades & Warranty is solid, and the screen brightness is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for AAA gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2070. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The port selection is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the HIDevolution MSI GT76 Titan DT 9SF 17.3” FHD 240Hz | 3.6 GHz i7-9700K, RTX 2070, 16GB 2666MHz RAM, 512GB PCIe SSD + 1TB HDD | Authorized Performance Upgrades & Warranty!
